attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament & Hold An Emergency General Election
attributes.additional_details: We, The People, Whom YOU, Work For Demand Parliament Be Dissolved & An Emergency General Election Be Held Immediately The PM & Most Of The Tories Have Let Emergency Powers Go To Their Head, The Way The PM Has Handled This Plandemic Is Appaling, NOBODY Trusts Your Invisible "Experts" & Statistics Disprove Gov Actions At Every Turn. The Gov Is A Complete Farse & We Need New Leadership. This Government Has Succeeded In Only One Respect... At Turning Regular People Against Common Sence & Each Other!
attributes.background: The Prime Minister Has Let Emergency Powers Go To His Head, His Handling Of This Plandemic Is Appaling, NOBODY Believes Half The "Experts" That We Never See, & Statistics Dissprove Government Actions & Advice At Every Turn. The Government Is A Complete Farse & We Need New Leadership.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Hold an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
